author: Dr Sara Kayat
title: Doctor's Note: How to manage your asthma during coronavirus
description: Those with asthma are considered 'at risk' of developing complications. A doctor explains the steps they should take.
content:
COVID-19 does not discriminate, it could affect anyone, but we are aware that it may cause more serious complications for those who have existing, underlying health conditions.
One of these is asthma, a condition that affects some 235 million people around t… [+7616 chars]
